Specifications.Insulation:
850 fill European white goose down, 89g
Coreloft™ 80 and 100 insulation
Specifications.Water Resistance: Arato™ 10 face fabric has DWR finish
Specifications.Pockets: 2 zippered hand pockets, 1 internal zippered pocket with stuff sack
Specifications.Length:
Centre back length: 72 cm / 28.5 in
Slightly longer hip-length design
Specifications.Recommended Use: Alpine Activities, Urban Winter Adventures, Alpine Skiing, Hiking, Snowboarding, Backcountry Touring, Trekking, Winter Activities
